scripts.test:coverage: shadow-cljs compile test && c8 --all --include='.shadow-cljs/builds/test/dev/out/cljs-runtime/promethean.openplanner.client.js' --exclude='**/*_test.js' --check-coverage --lines 60 -r text -r json-summary -r lcov --report-dir coverage node --enable-source-maps target/test.cjs
scripts.test:mutation: shadow-cljs compile test && stryker run --config-file stryker.conf.mjs
